creator: hanafey@dna.es.dupont.com
text:
The BUILDING.txt file incorrectly refers to "proxy.use" as the variable that
controls the use of a proxy, but the "build.xml" in fact uses the variable named
"useproxy".
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 41557 ***
creator: hanafey@dna.es.dupont.com
